title: Login music not playing
body: When I am at the login screen in the client, the login music is not playing. The option to turn off and off the music is greyed out. Answers?

replies.body: Check under your client's options. I had a "play login music" checkbox there that I had to click before I could hear login music

> [{quoted}](name=TheTrumpTroop,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uEnJZyOq,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-18T15:25:29.341+0000)
>
> Check under your client's options. I had a "play login music" checkbox there that I had to click before I could hear login music

The whole point was that option was greyed out...

> [{quoted}](name=joegrenda,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uEnJZyOq,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2017-03-11T21:34:00.717+0000)
>
> The whole point was that option was greyed out...

Edit: I figured out my problem (identical to described): Music was disabled in the sound options {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I was having the same problem! thanks so much
Yup, I was just about to post it here but then saw this

Same thing for me. I usually had it turned off as it's distracting sometimes but there was no problem turning it on in the old client. The new one though has it grayed out all the time through all the patches since the open Beta version.

DUDE so many here already told u how to fix it pls read... on the right corner of the client there is that option menü button press it and enable the music there if u do that ull be able to use the "gray login music button" again {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}
Just to second this and bump this up. For me this is happening on a Mac.

Hmm.. that's a new one! The only thing I can think that could be causing this is if there are corrupt files in your installation directory. Try running a repair of the game files by hitting the cog icon in the top-right and hit the *Initiate Full Repair* button.

Let me know if this helped or not.
No change, option to play music still greyed out. :/

Hmmm, I think at this point the only other option is to try a clean reinstall using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to see if the option pops up after a fresh copy of League has been loaded.

Please update me on what happens.

I have reinstalled the League Client, but when I try to download the Alpha Client, it gives me this message
file:///C:/Users/lordr/OneDrive/Pictures/League%20Popup.PNG
Unfortunately, I cannot see the directory you linked. Can you upload the photo to [**Imgur**](https://imgur.com/) so I can take a look?

I reinstalled the client after I got the last mesage, http://imgur.com/xeA047z, 
Now I get this message when I to get into the normal client, http://imgur.com/Cqpd0cK

Try deleting the **LeagueClient.exe** file inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and then launch the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file from the same directory. You may need to try this a few times before it works.

Let me know the results!

Good news: I can play League now!
Bad News: Login Music still greyed out.

Damn, sorry to hear that. :/

At this point, I'd chalk this up to a Bug with the Client and I'd recommend reporting it on the [**Client Discussion Board**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).

If you have any questions, let me know!
It worked :) Just follow the guide Targons Blade sent and make sure everything league related is gone before you redownload, then chose the option to install the beta client.
Yeah! I've been having the same problem. I hope someone finds a solution.

Hey, I'm having the exact same problem ever since the new client came out, just havn't asked about it cause too lazy xD. but yea hoping there is a fix to it. ive run 2 repairs on the client and it still hasn't worked. no login music plays and the disable music button is greyed out. so far nothing has fixed it. I also made a second account but it still did it on that too.
